name: Offroad Driver Dirt Sim
description:
Offroad Driver Dirt Sim is a physics based off-road racing game with realistic 3D graphics. Show your hill climb driving skills and hill racing stunts to get a free offroad driving license.
Features:
- Start the Game
- Realistic Off road Tracks
- Desert Environments
- Challenging Levels
- Heavy Music for 4x4 SUV Hummer
